评论概述: They’re neat but you get what you pay for
评论详情: I saw a bunch of similar earrings in different listings but decided to go with this one because there was the two-piece chain one that I wanted, and a smaller one that I thought would make a good alternative. Their designs are great, pretty much what I had hoped for; I got two compliments the first day I wore them. As other reviewers shared, though, they’re not the highest quality.  While the chains are black, the cones are kind of a dark gray gunmetal color. Not bad but I guess I expected them to be black also. They are very light, which I think is a good thing (they’re very comfortable to wear) but I’m a little concerned they could bend or break easily.  My biggest gripe is the tip of one of the cones on the simpler earring was bent slightly. Not only that, but it seems like a layer of the outer coating of metal chipped off; the bent part was slightly thinner. Not worth returning them or anything to me - I just carefully straightened it out with some pliers, but I felt that if I overdid it, it would have broken. It’s not perfect but you can’t tell from a couple feet away, and I like to keep a little distance from most people anyway. 😂  Overall they’re fine but a little on the cheap side, which is great if you want a couple inexpensive accessories as long as you’re ok with that.

I bought these for a cause play event, and I thought they would be metal or heavier than they are. They still work for my intention, but I was expecting more of a metal texture. They are very plastic, including the chain as plastic.
love them
Personally I think these earrings are great. They're not too heavy so they don't tug on your lobes and I thought the clip was gonna snap while adjusting it to my ear but I've yet to have a problem.
